general.notice: Use effects to highlight layers or features for an eye-catching map.
general.emphasize: Decide which features get emphasized and which ones get de-emphasized.

error.title: Unable to configure effects
error.text1: The current layer effect is not supported for further edits. If the effect is working as desired you can keep the current configuration.
error.text2: Overwriting effects will remove current configuration.

effectsSummary.dropShadow: Make objects look like they are floating.
effectsSummary.blur: Defocus or soften the edges of map features.
effectsSummary.brightnessContrast: Adjust how light or dark map features are.
effectsSummary.hueRotate: Transform colors relative to one another.
effectsSummary.saturate: Increase or decrease the intensity of the colors.
effectsSummary.invert: Transform all colors to their opposite, like a negative image.
effectsSummary.sepia: Convert colors to shades of brown to mimic old photographs.

featureEffectsSummary.strongDropShadow: Apply strong drop shadow to emphasize some features.
featureEffectsSummary.dropShadow_transparency: Apply drop shadow to emphasize some features and semi-transparency to de-emphasize others.
featureEffectsSummary.dropShadow_gray: Apply drop shadow to emphasize some features and grayscale to de-emphasize others.
featureEffectsSummary.dropShadow_blur: Apply drop shadow to emphasize some features and blur to de-emphasize others.
featureEffectsSummary.mutedBlur: Apply blur to de-emphasize some features.
featureEffectsSummary.mutedGray: Apply grayscale to de-emphasize some features.
featureEffectsSummary.bloom_transparency: Apply bloom to emphasize some features and semi-transparency to de-emphasize others.
featureEffectsSummary.bloom_gray: Apply bloom to emphasize some features and grayscale to de-emphasize others.
featureEffectsSummary.bloom_blur: Apply bloom to emphasize some features and blur to de-emphasize others.

filter.tipMsg: Add one or more query expressions to emphasize certain features. Features not matching the query will be de-emphasized.
filter.invalidMsg: This query expression cannot be shown. You can keep it as-is but you will not be able to make any changes to it.
